Pre-Game Insights: The article mentions that India will play against Ireland in a 3-match T20I series, with the first match on August 18, 2023. The Indian team includes several new faces and players making their comebacks. India has previously won two T20 series against Ireland in 2018 and 2022. The match will be broadcasted live on Sports18 and other channels
Miscellaneous Highlights: The article notes that this is the third T20I series between India and Ireland, providing historical context about their previous encounters
